frontmatter.title: Best Programming Jokes February 2022
frontmatter.description: In this post, we have collected a handful of jokes, that have been floating around the Web, which showcase a programmer’s sense of humor. Don’t worry if you don’t get all of them — just get a programmer to explain it to you.

frontmatter.title: RabbitMQ vs Redis vs Kafka
frontmatter.description: When using asynchronous communication for Microservices, it is common to use a message broker. A broker ensures communication between different microservices is reliable and stable, that the messages are managed and monitored within the system and that messages don’t get lost.
